snippet: The Japanese electronics maker Panasonic returned to the black last quarter as cost cuts and a weaker yen offset sliding sales.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese electronics maker Panasonic returned to the black last quarter as cost cuts and a weaker yen offset sliding sales.

headline.main: Panasonic Swings to a Profit After Cost Cuts
headline.print_headline: Panasonic Swings To a Profit After Cost Cuts
